text: Welcome to Helsinki 2.0! Another opportunity for Trump to cozy up to his favorite tyrant, even as Putin’s puppets are indicted for attacking our democracy. 99 days after Helsinki 1.0, we still have no idea what secret concessions Trump made. https://t.co/qd24wc2SsS
These acts of attempted murder—in effect, terrorist attacks—must be denounced & deterred. Prosecution & punishment must hold the perpetrators accountable. Throw the book at whoever made these bombs.
The President’s remarks belie his call for unity. His words speak for themselves. https://t.co/uZgZ9C4gNK
The President knows better. CNN & other press are not the monsters he seeks to make them—but words can breed real ones. https://t.co/pEEgPuiOnF
Bombs—rhetorical or real—targeting the free press & political leaders (most recently, my brave friend Cory Booker) will not deter or distract us.

Hate speech on the suspect’s van is Exhibit A, combined with selection of targets, showing political motive in this terrorist attack. Anybody who conspired or aided him must be apprehended & held accountable. The investigation must continue.

Voluntary & temporary actions aren't enough to end this scourge. FDA must step in to take real, permanent, & effective actions to ban flavors & protect children from the dangers of e-cigs. https://t.co/IBdWyHZDMJ

Our hearts break & stomachs turn after these shameful anti-Semitic murders. My thoughts are with the families & brave law enforcement. Congress is complicit—by its inaction—in this loathsome epidemic of gun violence.
Today all Americans join these families who weep in grief & horror. We must come together to stop this national epidemic of gun violence. People in power must take action.

Vitriol breeds violence. Hate speech breeds hate crimes. Demagoguery & dehumanizing our political opponents, or those who don’t look like us, or worship differently must end. A day of platitudes from political leaders is no substitute for action against gun violence.

There are no words to bring back the brave & beautiful lives lost to this unspeakable hate crime. But we know—from Sandy Hook, Sutherland Springs, Oak Park, & Charleston—that love, hope, & faith always win.

Troops as props—Trump uses our brave soldiers in a blatant political ploy on the border. Is the world’s mightiest military necessary to deal with a dwindling caravan of asylum seekers? https://t.co/ZsPXuFTgNs

It’s called demagoguery—fanning flames of hatred & false fear, & offering unlawful, ineffectual solutions like an executive order ending birthright citizenship. Unconstitutional & unworthy of a president. https://t.co/kNLcCZ2Io1

The U.S. gov’t takes targeted threats seriously & prioritizes the protection of individuals as a matter of national security. The Intel Community must account for known threats against Mr. Khashoggi. https://t.co/XuMSpeuKCZ
Always more hopeful & optimistic after spending time with committed teachers & engaged students! Thanks Lincoln Middle School for having me! https://t.co/E25ehurRPU

Sec. Zinke has violated public trust for personal gain far too many times since taking office. In just 20 months on the job, he’s been the subject of 15 federal investigations. DOJ will now be able to investigate potential criminal violations. https://t.co/hKaajzvkzX

Mueller’s laser like focus on Stone, & intriguing new Bannon interview, show him constructing a criminal conspiracy mosaic—meticulously, methodically, masterfully. While lying low before Tuesday’s elections, Mueller is putting in place pieces of proof to complete the puzzle. https://t.co/zlpWuuObcj

Setting Yemen ceasefire deadline shows strong spine from SecDef Mattis–a potentially monumental step. Failure to meet the 30-day deadline should mean a prompt end to US support for Saudi’s operations in Yemen. https://t.co/9nHLEhwybj
Brutal & barbaric beyond words—mounting evidence cries out for immediate international investigation. A month later, Saudi’s continuing cover up & noncooperation is stunning. https://t.co/IN5wc5wV6m

Once again the FDA & Big Tobacco are dragging their feet & offering only half measures to protect American youth from nicotine addiction. Immediate, permanent, & real steps are needed to curb the sale of e-cigs. https://t.co/HiUbFdmsgR

On #Halloween, Trump & Republicans continue to try & trick Americans w/false claims—but no costume can disguise their record on health care: Repeated attempts to repeal the ACA. Suing to remove protections for preexisting conditions. Systematic sabotage of the health care system. https://t.co/d6FzCnvVLY
Gunbroker peddles hate, bigotry, & anti-Semitism with seeming approval of USA Shooting & USOC. Time today for an ultimatum—break your ties now. https://t.co/lSLEN5i2ow

Saudi Arabia’s web of lies continues falling apart leaving questions abound about what happened & who knew what & when. US leadership must insist on an impartial, international investigation not protect predatory allies. https://t.co/EAAef61nvK

Sec. Zinke’s apparently improper taxpayer travel may be only the tip of a vast unethical iceberg now under DOJ investigation. Land deal & business ties seem suspect. Accountability is critical. https://t.co/Wy6nR7RHT7

Call for ceasefire is progress, but Congress must ensure US gov’t ends support for the inhumane war in Yemen & holds Saudi Arabia accountable for Khashoggi's brutal murder. The Saudis are unreliable partners—US cannot condone their reckless foreign policy.
Trump’s rambling, irrational, demagogic diatribe was painful & sad. No solutions, no facts, no values—Trump’s political stunt is morally & legally bankrupt.

Starting TODAY, CT residents can go to https://t.co/ZTuCXlHmzd or call 1-855-805-4325 to explore their health care options & sign up or make changes to their coverage for 2019! Open enrollment runs through December 15. https://t.co/md3pfeZBgi
Developing evidence about Stone as Wikileaks’ link to Bannon & the Trump campaign tightens the collusion vise—more pieces in the criminal mosaic. https://t.co/5E8gDo6VpD

Removing reproductive rights from the State Department’s human rights reports is dangerous, outrageous, & unacceptable. We wrote to SecState Pompeo yesterday to demand this vital, pertinent information be included in the 2018 reports. #WomensRightsAreHumanRights https://t.co/eoal7onpBF

Sec. Zinke played fast & loose with CT tribal rights. Why? 
Interior IG, who is now investigating his improper denial of casino approval, should this one be referred to the DOJ too? Another likely conflict of interest.
https://t.co/T7OgThebQe
Honored to join a Military Appreciation event this morning hosted by Eastern Connecticut Chamber of Commerce. We owe the brave, dedicated heroes who defend our nation so much. https://t.co/Wg24tq9xO0

.@SenJackReed is right. Processing asylum seekers does not require a military response. Trump’s political ploy to send troops to the border days before the election is unwise & unproductive. Our troops must stand ready to protect our nation against real, truly dangerous threats. https://t.co/xxBqJaGAJI

These Saudi attacks on ports & airports (necessary for food & medicine imports) only deepen a humanitarian disaster fraught by famine & disease. The Saudis are “U.S.-backed.”  A disgrace, apparently in flagrant defiance of U.S. officials calling for a cease-fire. https://t.co/id64EsZhQk

After a harrowing & heartbreaking week for the Jewish community, people of all faiths continue to stand together against anti-Semitism. We will not let this evil triumph. With our faith & history as a guide, injustice & cruelty will be met with action. #ShowUpForShabbat

Joined by officials in Clinton as FEMA listens to local leaders in New London & Middlesex counties & views the scale & scope of the flood damage. Roads & bridges washed out & rivers diverted. I will do all I can to work with these towns & FEMA to support federal disaster relief. https://t.co/ZJblqR2ipo

Historic & unprecedented discipline reflects USAG’s horrific failure to protect its athletes. USOC finally heeded our call to act aggressively against sexual abuse tolerated by USAG. Survivors deserve so much better than USAG’s cruelty & systemic mismanagement. https://t.co/mAcJRkvt9l

Last night we celebrated the longstanding tradition of cooperation between the US & Israel. Thank you to AIPAC for having me & for your work to strengthen this strategic partnership. https://t.co/pfBbSbAoM1

Mr. President, checks & balances are central to our democracy. Threats against the House for doing its job—performing oversight & ensuring a transparent & accountable government—belie your call for bipartisanship.

This is a break the glass moment. Replacing the Attorney General with a non-Senate-confirmed political staffer is highly irregular & unacceptable. Protecting the Special Counsel investigation is more urgent than ever.
Our hearts break again. Keeping guns away from dangerous people is an imperative for the new Congress. Brave law enforcement & young students senselessly lost to gun violence. https://t.co/X2UY9ZEExU

The fight to protect the American dream for all—including DACA recipients—continues. Today’s court ruling is another powerful, positive step forward for immigrant youth. #HereToStay https://t.co/xOxSP0USfJ

Stunning attack on 1st Amendment by the WH. Again Trump lashes out at those who ask uncomfortable & difficult questions. His goal, preventing access to the facts that would help discredit his lies. I'll continue to stand with all who work to preserve a free press & open democracy https://t.co/xEzbf9THQX

Legitimate asylum seekers fleeing persecution & death deserve humanity & compassion. This cruel new rule reflects Trump’s heartless campaign to fan flames of fear & division, & frighten & deter genuine asylum seekers. It betrays America’s values. https://t.co/1QF8T3yMJW

Trump broke norms & handed DOJ over to Mr. Whitaker—architect of a roadmap to stifle & strangle the Special Counsel. Americans are speaking up & demanding Congress protect the investigation. Are my Republican colleagues listening? https://t.co/921iVqn1tK

A woman’s constitutional right to decide whether or when to have children belongs to her—not her government or boss. The Trump admin’s continued attack on birth control & abortion access is reprehensible. https://t.co/fNRs3BrAQb

FDA has waited too long to do too little, but seems poised to take steps toward ultimately banning flavored e-cigs. Saving children from addiction requires stopping slick promos, flavors, & other lures that get kids hooked. The era of free rein for e-cig manufacturers must end. https://t.co/xr6JNCTvAe

Seeking asylum is not illegal. We have nothing to fear from people fleeing violence & persecution. Our strength comes from accepting people in need—not denying those at risk a chance at safety. https://t.co/1D2z4njJhi

Immediate solutions are needed after troubling reports indicate Amtrak isn’t holding up their deal to cross-honor CTrail & U-Pass tickets. Track work & locomotive maintenance backlog is also causing unacceptable delays & cancelations. Amtrak step up! CT commuters rely on you. https://t.co/cavHUTzDIG
Happy 243rd Birthday #MarineCorps! #SemperFi #BattlesWon https://t.co/ofkDCUAaXl

Overdue but welcome decision by SecDef Mattis to end US refueling assistance to Saudi-led offensive in Yemen. An important 1st step to end US involvement in the hostilities & humanitarian crisis. Now we must halt all military assistance & urge a negotiated ceasefire. https://t.co/xMQzD6x2Fm

Today we honor all the brave men & women who have defended our nation & protected our freedoms. On #VeteransDay & every day, thank you & your family for your sacrifice & service. https://t.co/htI6kPCcIc

Disturbing rise of hate crimes in the U.S. continues for a third consecutive year. America must not be the home to hate or harbor this racist, anti-Semitic, anti-LGBTQ+ rage. Congress must pass the NO HATE Act & stand together in opposition of these abhorrent crimes. https://t.co/eSkDmBUKU1

E-cigarette use is an epidemic & belated half-measures like those by Juul are too little, too late to save kids from addiction. FDA mustn't fall for these loophole-riddled announcements & immediately ban all flavors regardless of where/how they are sold. https://t.co/pGiSFLeeiX

FDA’s approval of an opioid 10x more powerful than fentanyl & 1,000x stronger than morphine will only add fuel to the opioid epidemic. Dsuvia can cause death with one use & would have catastrophic consequences if it reached the streets. https://t.co/gmT9YSsgyU

The Coast Guard calls CT home—employing thousands. The bipartisan Coast Guard reauthorization bill is a major win for our state & nation—it will ensure the Coast Guard remains strong & authorizes federal funds for the construction & design of the Coast Guard Museum in New London.

Through slick marketing tactics & the use of flavors, e-cig manufacturers have targeted our kids—copying the predatory playbook of Big Tobacco. I commend the FDA for finally moving forward with common sense solutions—but more can & must be done to end this public health epidemic. https://t.co/F8Hpymc9tM

Death sentences for henchmen are no substitute for holding accountable top Saudi officials. Silencing witnesses & imposing token sanctions simply enables a Crown Prince cover-up. An international investigation & full disclosure are still critical. https://t.co/sSvNZYUBHf

.@ATT, @verizon, @sprint, & @TMobile seem to be forgetting a core principle of #NetNeutrality—it’s wrong to discriminate against internet traffic based on who is sending or receiving it. @SenMarkey, @RonWyden, & I are making sure content isn't being slowed to advantage providers. https://t.co/KC01R0F7Sp

This ruling is a victory for press freedom & the rule of law. Let this be a message to President Trump: intimidating, berating, & threatening the press will not be tolerated in our country. https://t.co/vfoR1KRTVj

Gutting Title IX’s enforcement guidance seems designed to protect universities from responsibility, rather than students from sexual assault. We should be holding schools accountable for their policies to ensure a safe campus for everyone—not letting them off the hook. https://t.co/WQnzSS55LW

Trump must accept (for once) his intelligence experts’ incontrovertible conclusion: Crown Prince MBS is culpable for Khashoggi’s monstrous murder. This brazen killing must have consequences—sanctions, prosecution, removal of MBS & others, not continued cover-up, enabled by Trump. https://t.co/6gjHoLVjzI
